issues.author: JCash
issues.body:
We've renamed the function to better match `go.cancel_animations()`
The function can now cancel a single animation of a node, or all animations at the same time:
```lua
gui.cancel_animations(node, "position.x") -- cancel a single animation
gui.cancel_animations(node) -- cancel all animations
```

⚠️ The old function `gui.cancel_animation()` is now deprecated. Please use the new one instead!
issues.title: Add gui.cancel_animations() to cancel one or all animation(s) at the same time

issues.author: matgis
issues.body: The editor now supplies positions and normals to all vertex attributes with a matching semantic type when rendering objects in the Scene View. This reverts a change introduced in #10635, which caused a regression for shaders that make use of both world-space and local-space attributes of the same semantic type.
issues.title: Feed positions and normals to all vertex attributes with a matching semantic-type

issues.author: AGulev
issues.body:
To keep Bob.jar lightweight, it doesn’t include all platform architectures and symbols. When needed, the “vanilla” engine is downloaded from the CDN.
This update introduces caching for those downloaded files in the `.internal` folder, avoiding repeated downloads on each bundle.
issues.title: Add caching for the “vanilla” engine when downloaded through Bob.jar to avoid repeated downloads

issues.author: AGulev
issues.body: HTML5 symbols are now provided for all build types and platforms: a folder `<project_name>_symbols` containing all symbols is created alongside the bundle.
issues.title: Provide debug symbols for all HTML5 target architectures and build configurations

issues.author: AGulev
issues.body:
- Orthographic camera gizmo size in the scene view reflects `game.project` display width/height and Orthographic Zoom.
- Orthographic camera FOV is now disabled when Orthographic Projection is enabled.
- Perspective-only fields are disabled in orthographic mode.
- Orthographic Zoom must be greater than zero; invalid values show an error.
issues.title: Enhanced the orthographic camera behavior in the editor for better usability and accuracy

issues.author: britzl
issues.body:
Added the ability to run`aapt2` (Android Asset Packaging Tool), `bundletool` and `jarsigner` from the commandline.

```sh
java -cp bob.jar com.dynamo.bob.tools.AndroidTools aapt2 link --proto-format ....
java -cp bob.jar com.dynamo.bob.tools.AndroidTools jarsigner -verbose -keystore debug.keystore ...
java -cp bob.jar com.dynamo.bob.tools.AndroidTools bundletool build-apks --bundle= ...
```
issues.title: Add support for running the Android tools in bob from the commandline

issues.author: JCash
issues.body:
This allows the developer to pass in an expected extension, in order to make sure that the resources path passed in is the correct type. This is especially helpful if the code is data driven and the developer doesn't know the resource path beforehand.

[Documentation](https://defold.com/ref/beta/engine-resource-src-dmsdk-resource-resource-hpp/#GetWithExt:factory-path_hash-ext_hash-resource)
issues.title: Added dmResource::GetWithExt() to dmsdk for more robust resource loading
